title: Clear day in a city with moderate traffic and a few pedestrians.
caption: A slow-moving car on a city street with a few pedestrians and parked cars.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 5.0 m/s). There are 14 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a one-way city street with a few parked cars on the side. There are several pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is clear and sunny. The traffic is moderate with a few cars driving in the opposite direction.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and carefully, following the traffic rules and maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. It slows down when approaching intersections or pedestrian crossings. It changes lanes when necessary to avoid obstacles or to make a turn. The driver is cautious and attentive, constantly monitoring the surroundings for any potential risks.
